Task Assigner NodeÔÉÅ

File: scripts/task_assigner.py Purpose: Central task distribution to robots based on availability and location.

Subscribers: - /new_orders (std_msgs/String): Receives orders in format "Table X, Dish Y" - /robot_status (std_msgs/String): Gets robot status updates

Publishers: - /assigned_tasks (std_msgs/String): Sends assignments in format "robotX:Table Y, Dish Z"

Logic Flow: 1. Receives new order 2. Selects robot with:

  • Highest battery (>20%)

  • Closest to target table

  1. Publishes assignment

Example Message: .. code-block:: python

"robot2:Table 3, Salmon Sushi"
